citations.narrative:
An outdoor enclosure housing one Patagonian cavy and one capybara had a moderate accumulation of miscellaneous
items stored directly beside the enclosure’s fence line. Amongst the pile of objects were toys ranging from toy wagons
and small shopping carts to dump trucks, a bicycle, and other figures within a wooden crate.
Excess buildup of unused items can attract pests and promote means for breeding grounds, as well as difficulty in
maintaining husbandry standards and daily observations within the area. The premise and grounds shall be kept clean
and in good repair in order to prevent animals from injury and facilitate good husbandry practices that place
accumulations of trash in designated areas and cleared as necessary to protect the health of the animals.
Correct by September 5, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee and facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
An outdoor enclosure housing one Patagonian cavy and one capybara had a moderate accumulation of miscellaneous 
items stored directly beside the enclosure’s fence line. Amongst the pile of objects were toys ranging from toy wagons 
and small shopping carts to dump trucks, a bicycle, and other figures within a wooden crate. 
 
Excess buildup of unused items can attract pests and promote means for breeding grounds, as well as difficulty in 
maintaining husbandry standards and daily observations within the area. The premise and grounds shall be kept clean 
and in good repair in order to prevent animals from injury and facilitate good husbandry practices that place 
accumulations of trash in designated areas and cleared as necessary to protect the health of the animals. 
 
Correct by September 5, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee and facility representative.
